channel.title: Nothing is working client or source
channel.description:
First off, i'm not sure if this is in the right section, i did check before i posted and didn't see anything.
anyway, my problem is iv'e download many (about 5-6) client or sources and everytime i try to run them i get some kind of error most of the time it's this one " The system cannot find the path specified " I have my environmental variables set to..
PATH - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin CLASSPATH - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin
Any help would be very much appreciated!! =D
